items.summary: Update the Community section to display social media link cards/buttons for Discord, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter/X, and Reddit (5 total) and make each item an actual outbound link that opens in a new tab.

Add configurable URL placeholders/constants for each social platform link used in the Community section so the actual channel/profile URLs can be set in one place without changing the component structure.

Update the Footer "Community" link list to match the Community sectionâ€™s supported platforms (Discord, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter/X, Reddit) and ensure each footer link points to the appropriate external URL (not just #community).
